abstract: An array of input parameters for the mix.
overview:
## Discussion

The array contains instances of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAudioMixInputParameters]. You don’t need an instance for each audio track that contributes to the mix. By default, the system processes audio for those tracks without an associated `AVAudioMixInputParameters` instance.

# inputParameters

**Instance Property**

An array of input parameters for the mix.

## Declaration

```swift
var inputParameters: [AVAudioMixInputParameters] { get set }
```

## Discussion

The array contains instances of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAudioMixInputParameters]. You don’t need an instance for each audio track that contributes to the mix. By default, the system processes audio for those tracks without an associated `AVAudioMixInputParameters` instance.
title: inputParameters
